effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Dispatch by 6% stacking up to 5 times. Dispatch has a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Roll the Bones has a 40% increased chance of granting additional combat enhancements and also applies 1 stack of  Winning Streak! for each combat enhancement granted.

Stacks applied by Roll the Bones can exceed the normal Winning Streak! maximum of 5.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 178,656 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,158 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 188 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Mechano-Core Amplifier

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful abilities have a chance to power the amplifier, randomly increasing either your highest secondary stat by 3,646 or your lowest secondary stat by 4,600 for 10 sec.

description: Intended for machine use only. Use at your own risk.

spells.description: Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: Your first melee strike against an enemy slams them and nearby enemies with a quake of shadow magic dealing up to 275,103 Shadow damage split between them.
